nodes.text: Marinna Reynolds was a pilot who served in the Rebel Alliance. Receiving training at the rebel base on the moon Yavin 4, Reynolds worked in the kitchen with fellow trainees Chase Wilsorr and Oriss Khan, teaching the former about different foods from the soon-to-be-pilot's homeworld. Reynolds eventually completed training on Yavin 4 and, by the time of the Battle of Hoth in 3 ABY, began flying with the Alliance's Rogue Squadron.
Marinna Reynolds was mentioned in the short story "A Good Kiss," written by C.B. Lee as a part of the 2020 short story collection From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back.
